services.name: REST
services.description: Support for Java API for RESTful Web Services.

services.description: Support for applications that use application-managed and container-managed JPA.

services.description: Support for Spring Boot with Spring MVC applications.

services.description: A simple yet powerful representation of RESTful APIs.
